verbs.description: It [V: would] be a dramatic but symbolic event to set up leader Kim Jong Un 's summit with President Donald Trump next month
[ARG1: It] [ARGM-MOD: would] [V: be] [ARG2: a dramatic but symbolic event to set up leader Kim Jong Un 's summit with President Donald Trump next month]
It would be [ARG0: a dramatic but symbolic event] to [V: set] up [ARG1: leader Kim Jong Un 's summit with President Donald Trump next month]
